datetime



DateTimeFormat

type: C enum
description: datetime string formats
DATETIME_STANDARD output datetime to standard format
DATETIME_YYYYMMDDHHMMSS output date time to yyyymmddhhmmss
DATETIME_COUNT

c_date_time_to_cstr

cstr c_date_time_to_cstr(DateTimeFormat format, cstr str);
type: C function
description: get local time and copy to dynamic string

c_date_time_to_fstr

void c_date_time_to_fstr(DateTimeFormat format, fstr str);
type: C function
description: get local time and set to fixed string
